sig_info: Each time a Stagger expires naturally on the Opponent Mangog has a 10 to 20% chance to gain +1 Hatred.
While Unstoppable Mangog Passively Regenerates 5 to 14.99% of incoming hit damage instantly.
Gain +0.94 to 2.32 Attack Rating per Hatred.
Gain +3.21 to 5.42 Critical Damage Rating per Hatred.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Immune to Armor Break Debuffs and all Bleed effects.
Mangog suffers -40% Combat Power Rate, instead gaining 5% of a Power Bar every second while below 2 full Bars.
If struck while Unstoppable, gain a non-stacking Fury Buff granting +94 Attack Rating for 10 seconds.
HATRED OF A BILLION BILLION BEINGS - MAX: Mangog starts with 3 Hatred. Hatred is unaffected by Ability Accuracy and cannot be gained more than once every 0.2 seconds.
Gain +1 Hatred each time either champion finishes a 5-hit combo.
Gain +1 Hatred when Nullifying a Buff.
Each stack of Hatred grants the following:
+177.78 Energy Resistance.
+51.19 Armor Rating.
+46.09 Critical Rating.
ENRAGED: Activating a Special Attack with 10 stacks of Hatred triggers Enrage, causing Hate to fall off over 8 seconds after the Special Attack ends.
While Enraged, each time Mangog would gain Hate, Enrage is paused for 3 second(s) instead.
Take 50% less damage from enemy attacks and the Recoil Mastery.
Gain an indefinite Unstoppable Buff, this is removed when Enrage expires or if Mangog is struck by a Special Attack.
During Special Attacks 1 and 2 gain an indefinite Unblockable Buff.
Basic Attacks that make contact with the Opponent have a 70% chance to inflict a 14 second Stagger Debuff.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Heavy Charging can be held for an extended duration and deals a burst of up to 470 Energy Damage based on charge time.
While Enrage is not active, consume 2 Hatred to inflict an Armor Break Debuff for 15 seconds, reducing Armor Rating by 177.78.
While Enraged, gain +220% Ability Power Rate while Charging.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activation gain +2 Hatred, this bypasses the gain cooldown.
The second and final hits inflict a Stagger Debuff for 14 seconds.
If Enraged, gain a non-stacking Energy Protection Buff, granting full immunity to Shock, Incinerate, Coldsnap, and Frostbite effects for 15 seconds. This Buff is paused while Enraged.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit deals a burst of 42.3 Energy Damage.
The first hit Steals the Opponent’s Power above their nearest Full Bar, if they have less then 1 Full Bar of Power, all their Power is stolen. Mangog gains 100% of the Power stolen from this attack.
If Enraged the final hit inflict a Stun Debuff for 3 seconds. If the Opponent is struck the Stun is removed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Nullify up to 10 Buffs from the Opponent.
Gain a non-stacking Regeneration Buff healing +31.55 Base Health over 5 seconds. This is increased by an additional +31.55 Base Health for each Buff that was Nullified during this attack.
If Enraged this attack inflicts a Stun Debuff for 2 seconds.
